TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputCacheProfile extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class OutputCacheProfile Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 配置可由应用程序页使用的输出缓存配置文件。

span.span: Configures the output cache profile that can be used by the application pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种方法以编程方式访问和修改`add`的元素`outputCacheProfiles`主题中`caching`配置文件的部分。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `add` element of the `outputCacheProfiles` section in the `caching` section of a configuration file. 对象集中了常用的配置设置，如依赖项、 缓存位置和缓存过期时间，无需在每个页上指定它们。The object centralizes frequently used configuration settings such as dependencies, cache location, and cache expiration time, eliminating the need to specify them on every page. 可以应用于页使用`CacheProfile`指令的特性。The can be applied to a page using the `CacheProfile` attribute of the directive. > [!NOTE] > 指令可以重写所包含的所有设置对象除属性。The directive can override all the settings contained by an object except for the attribute. 这是为了启用或禁用而无需修改可能已重写的所有页面中的指令。This is to enable or disable the without having to modify the directives in all the pages that might have overridden it. 类监视依赖项，以便任何缓存项更改，将自动删除缓存的项。The class monitors the dependencies so that when any cached item changes, the cached item will be automatically removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合来访问其对象。The following code example shows how to use the collection to access its objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Duration { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Duration : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存页或缓存控件过程的持续时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time duration during which the page or control is cached.

value.span: 以秒为单位的持续时间。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示以秒为单位的页面或用户控件缓存的时间。The represents the time in seconds that the page or user control is cached. 设置此属性建立的页或控件，它向其应用，并将自动导致缓存其输出的 HTTP 响应的过期策略。Setting this property establishes an expiration policy for HTTP responses from the page or control to which it applies and will automatically cause the caching of their output. > [!NOTE] > 必须定义配置文件或使用配置文件的页面指令中。The must be defined in either the profile or the directive of a page using the profile. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether caching is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可允许或禁止只在一个位置的缓存机制。The property allows enabling or disabling the caching mechanism in one place only. 它会影响所有页或使用此控件。It affects all the pages or controls that use this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#12)]

member this.Location : System.Web.UI.OutputCacheLocation with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置输出缓存位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the output cache location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为`Any`，输出缓存可以位于浏览器客户端，请求的来源; 上的代理服务器或任何其他服务器，参与请求; 或处理请求的服务器上。If is set to `Any`, the output cache can be located on the browser client, where the request originated; on a proxy server, or any other server, participating in the request; or on the server where the request was processed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#5)]

member this.Name : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用若要将值赋给`CacheProfile`如果你想要应用的指令的特性给页或控件的值。You use the to assign a value to the `CacheProfile` attribute of the directive if you want to apply the values to a page or control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#11)]

member this.NoStore : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用辅助存储。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether secondary storage is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用次要存储，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if secondary storage is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 页面，其中具有属性设置为`true`发出一个响应，指定在其标头以防止敏感信息的辅助存储。The page that has the property set to `true` issues a response specifying in its header to prevent secondary storage of sensitive information. 此属性设置为`true`等效于调用Web 请求过程的方法。Setting this attribute to `true` is equivalent to invoking the method during a Web request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#4)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SqlDependency { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SqlDependency : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义 Web 应用程序和 SQL Server，允许在服务器上的数据中的更改检测的实例之间的关系。The defines a relationship between a Web application and an instance of SQL Server, allowing the detection of changes in the data at the server. 可确保的输出上它们所依赖的 SQL 表时，缓存的页面从缓存中删除更改。The ensures that output cached pages are removed from the cache whenever the SQL table on which they depend changes. > [!NOTE] > 类监视表，以便当表更改时，将从缓存自动删除项。The class monitors the table so that when the table changes, the item will be automatically removed from the Cache. 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByContentEncoding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByContentEncoding : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要缓存的一组内容编码（以分号分隔）。

span.span: Gets or sets the semicolon-delimited set of content encodings to be cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置是相同的由`VaryByContentEncoding`指令的特性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByContentEncoding` attribute of the directive. 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByControl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByControl : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一组以分号分隔要缓存的控件的 Id。The is a semicolon-delimited set of IDs of controls to be cached. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缓存多个版本的用户控件输出](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad)。For more information, see [Caching Multiple Versions of User Control Output](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad). > [!NOTE] > 设置是相同的由`VaryByControls`指令的特性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByControls` attribute of the directive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByCustom { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByCustom : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是任何文本，表示自定义输出缓存要求。The can be any text that represents custom output-caching requirements. 如果输入的自定义字符串，则必须重写应用程序的 Global.asax 文件中的方法。If a custom string is entered, you must override the method in the application's Global.asax file. > [!NOTE] > 设置是相同的由`VaryByCustom`指令的特性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByCustom` attribute of the directive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByHeader { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByHeader : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一组以分号分隔的标头用于改变缓存的输出。The is a semicolon-delimited set of headers used to vary the cached output. 这些是与请求关联的 HTTP 标头。These are HTTP headers associated with the request. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缓存的页面的多个版本](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c60284a9-9899-4fdc-a97c-020766b7572e)。For more information, see [Caching Multiple Versions of a Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c60284a9-9899-4fdc-a97c-020766b7572e). > [!NOTE] > 设置是相同的由`VaryByHeader`的属性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByHeader` attribute of the . 通过设置的值来更改方式的所有标头"\*"不建议。Varying by all headers by setting the value of "\*" is not recommended. 它可能会导致缓存溢出或拒绝服务攻击的 Web 服务器上。It can result in cache overflow or a denial of service attack on the Web server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#2)]

related.span: 缓存的页面的多个版本

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByParam { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByParam : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一组以分号分隔的参数用于改变缓存的输出。The is a semicolon-delimited set of parameters used to vary the cached output. 它允许不同的缓存的输出 GET 查询字符串或窗体 POST 参数。It allows varying the cached output by GET query string or form POST parameters. 例如，可以通过指定该用户控件的名称以及查询字符串或窗体发布参数改变用户控件输出到缓存。For instance, you can vary the user-control output to the cache by specifying the user-control name along with either a query string or a form POST parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缓存多个版本的用户控件输出](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad)。For more information, see [Caching Multiple Versions of User Control Output](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad). 设置必须定义配置文件或使用该配置文件的页面指令中。The setting must be defined in either the profile or the directive of the page using the profile. > [!NOTE] > 设置是相同的由`VaryByParam`的属性。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByParam` attribute of the . 按所有参数进行区分设置的值"\*"不建议。Varying by all parameters by setting the value of "\*" is not recommended. 它可能会导致缓存溢出或拒绝服务攻击的 Web 服务器上。It can result in cache overflow or a denial of service attack on the Web server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#8)]
